briefdescription.para: : check the user is whether sign-in or not

detaileddescription.para:
: access to firebase admin or member file to check if the user data is valid and if it's valid, change sign-in state into "on"
log id, user email, input email

briefdescription.para: : check whether the user is valid to sign-in

detaileddescription.para:
: by checking input user email and user password, distribute the user is valid
user email, user password

: permit user to logout if there's no error
none

briefdescription.para: : receive administrator user's input and permit to sign up on site

detaileddescription.para:
: if received administrator user's inputs have no error to sign up, send those information to firebase for sign up
username, email, password, retype_password, address, phone_num, birthday, hospital_name, area

briefdescription.para: : receive member user's input and permit to sign up on site

detaileddescription.para:
: if received member user's inputs have no error to sign up, send those information to firebase for sign up
username, email, password, retype_password, address, phone_num, birthday

briefdescription.para: : check user's sign-in state to block using other functions if he's not in sign-in state

detaileddescription.para:
: by checking user's sign-in state, block other functions if the user is not the registered user to prevent illegal user
each html id, user state

: a simple function to send user to main page
none

briefdescription.para: : function for administrator users to modify their information

detaileddescription.para:
: if sign-in user use this function, show every information they typed and permit them to modify their information if they want. Access to firebase and replace old data into new modified data
username, email, password, retype_password, address, phone_num, birthday, hospital_name, area, current user email, user's key value, current user's password

briefdescription.para: : function for member users to modify their information

detaileddescription.para:
: if sign-in user use this function, show every information they typed and permit them to modify their information if they want. Access to firebase and replace old data into new modified data
username, email, password, retype_password, address, phone_num, birthday, current user email, user's key value, current user's password
